0.text:
Hey bhena, its your birthday today and guess what you're getting old😂.....
Just kidding, i am too it's okay.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY to my dumbo sister, thank you for being my best friend and my personal therapist ❤️
we have a relationship like no other, you're the most important person in the world to me.
You're someone very special and i just want you to know wherever we go & whatever we do, i will always love you ❤️❤️ also my childhood would have been incomplete and imperfect without a sister like you.....
Happy Birthday once again.🥂
